content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a legal case involving two parties referred to as x and an anonymous party the text mentions the purchase of various assets including a mobile home a canoe a moped and a motorboat an award was given in favor of x regarding these assets the judgment states that x will be the sole owner of certain properties and their ownership entry in the land register will be deleted the text briefly mentions a car and a loan agreement but does not provide details the timeline of the legal proceedings is mentioned including the filing of the lawsuit the delivery of the lawsuit to the defendant and the submission of responses and statements the defendant filed their final position and both parties were invited to a hearing a summons was issued for a court hearing and the defendant appeared in court the plaintiff requested a default judgment since the defendant did not appear the court granted the plaintiffs claim and determined that a property rights agreement was necessary the court decided to leave the procedural costs to be borne by the parties and this decision can be appealed
